Description.Text: This hotel is located 15 km from Wulin Square, 10 km from Hangzhou railway station and 30 km from Hangzhou Xiaoshan airport.

The air-conditioned hotel has 128 rooms and offers a wide range of facilities, assuring guests a comfortable stay. Guests are welcomed in the lobby, which offers a 24-hour reception, as well as luggage storage and lift access to the upper floors. There is also a tour desk which helps guests in organising excursions to local attractions. Guests can dine in the restaurant and business travellers can make use of the conference facilities. For a fee, the hotel offers room service. Guests can also take advantage of the dry cleaning and laundry services.
